title: Abramovich must pay Â£2.5bn from Chelsea FC sale to Ukraine fund or face court, Starmer says
subtitle: The Prime Minister said Roman Abramovich should make good on his pledge that money from the sale of Chelsea FC would go to benefit Ukrainians
full_text: The Prime Minister said Roman Abramovich should make good on his pledge that money from the sale of Chelsea FC would go to benefit Ukrainians
